article_title: Denver police name suspect in fatal shooting near Lowry Heights – The Denver Post
article_text:
Denver police named a suspect Sunday in a fatal shooting in an apartment complex parking lot at 8000 East 12th Avenue early Saturday.

Police are looking for 18-year-old Tyree Darrell Bowen on a warrant that alleges first-degree murder.

Vincente Penaloza, 27, was found shot to death in the parking lot outside the Lowery Heights apartments at about 4 a.m. Saturday.

Anyone with information about Bowen’s whereabouts is asked to call Denver Metro Crime Stoppers at 720-913-7867 or send a text message to 274637 (CRIMES) with the title DMCS.

There is a $2,000 reward, and those providing tips can remain anonymous.
